message.content:
cs.CL, cs.CV, cs.MM, cs.IR, cs.LG. 

The paper focuses on improving the relevance between live comments and videos by modeling the cross-modal interactions among different modalities, including vision and audio. This suggests that the paper could belong to several arXiv CS sub-categories, such as natural language processing (cs.CL), computer vision and pattern recognition (cs.CV), multimedia (cs.MM), information retrieval (cs.IR), and machine learning (cs.LG). Among these, cs.CL and cs.CV are the most likely categories, as the paper deals with generating comments based on video content and modeling the relationships between different modalities.
